summary: Frontend-only testing completed for MegaRadio auth UI screens (auth-options, login, signup, forgot-password). All 9 requested features verified successfully. Auth screens properly display with new MegaRadio logo/arc effect. API integration with themegaradio.com mobile login endpoint working correctly - returns 401 for invalid credentials and error toast displays 'Wrong email or password! Try again'. All navigation flows between screens working.

issues: Back button icon (chevron) in top-left corner shows as square bracket '[' - may need proper icon font loading
data-testid attributes on TouchableOpacity buttons not accessible via standard selectors in web (React Native Web limitation)
Back button shows as '[' instead of chevron icon

action_items: Minor: Investigate why Ionicons chevron-back icon renders as '[' in web view - may need @expo/vector-icons web support configuration
critical_code_review_comments: All auth screens have proper data-testid attributes set
Form validations correctly implemented in login.tsx and signup.tsx
Error toast styling with coral/pink background correctly displays
authService.ts correctly uses themegaradio.com API base URL with X-API-Key header
authStore.ts implements proper secure storage with localStorage fallback for web
Forgot password subtitle typo has been fixed - now shows 'Enter your email'
TouchableOpacity buttons navigate correctly when clicked with mouse coordinates (React Native Web behavior)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auth UI screens fully functional. API integration with themegaradio.com working. TouchableOpacity click requires mouse coordinate clicks in Playwright (not standard click selectors due to React Native Web behavior). All navigation flows verified. The 520 errors in console are from other app features (likely station data), not auth-related.

test_1_auth_options_screen_render.details: Auth-options page renders with new MegaRadio logo+arc effect image, Login With Apple/Facebook/Google/Mail buttons, Continue without login link

test_2_login_with_mail_navigation.details: Clicking 'Login With Mail' on auth-options navigates to /login screen

test_3_login_screen_elements.details: Login page has Email input, Password input with proper styling and icons, Login button (pink), Forgot password link, and footer signup link

test_4_login_api_integration.details: Login button triggers API call to https://themegaradio.com/api/auth/mobile/login with X-API-Key header. Returns 401 for invalid credentials.

test_5_login_error_toast.details: Error toast 'Wrong email or password! Try again' appears when login fails with invalid credentials. Toast has coral/pink background.

test_6_signup_navigation.details: Clicking 'Don't you have an account?' link navigates to /signup screen

test_7_signup_screen_elements.details: Signup page has Name (Your name), Email, Password inputs with icons, password hint text, and Signup button (pink)

test_8_forgot_password_navigation.details: Clicking 'Forgot your password?' link navigates to /forgot-password screen with title, subtitle, email input, and Send button

test_9_continue_without_login.details: Clicking 'Continue without login' navigates to main app home page showing 'Welcome Back Guest'

screenshots_captured: .screenshots/auth_options_new_logo.png - Auth options with new MegaRadio logo and arc effect
.screenshots/before_login_click.png - Login form filled with invalid credentials
